member.name: T:StoreBaeltTicketLibrary.WeekendDiscount
member.summary: Class for creating an object that applies a 20% discount on cars traveling over the StoreBaelt Bridge on weekends. Note, Cars Only!

member.name: M:StoreBaeltTicketLibrary.WeekendDiscount.WeekendDiscountCar
member.summary: Method for getting the price of a ticket for a car on the weekends for the StoreBaelt bridge.
